faq.question: How much can I save with solar?
faq.answer: Most customers save between 70-90% on their electricity bills. The exact savings depend on your current consumption, system size, and local solar conditions.

faq.question: How long does installation take?
faq.answer: A typical residential installation takes 2-3 days, while commercial installations may take 1-2 weeks depending on system size.

faq.question: What happens during power outages?
faq.answer: Standard grid-tied systems will shut down during outages for safety reasons. If you want power during outages, we offer battery backup solutions.

faq.question: How much space do I need for solar panels?
faq.answer: As a rule of thumb, you need about 100 sq. ft. of shadow-free area for 1kW of solar installation.

faq.question: What maintenance is required?
faq.answer: Solar systems require minimal maintenance. We recommend cleaning the panels once every 2-3 months and an annual health check-up by our technicians.

faq.question: How do I apply for government subsidies?
faq.answer: Our team handles the entire subsidy application process for you, from documentation to follow-ups with the relevant authorities.
